MobilityPrintServerHosts.title: Mobility Print server hosts
MobilityPrintServerHosts.description: An array of hostnames or IP addresses of the Mobility Print server in your organisation. For example http://myhost.mydomain.com:9163, http://192.168.1.2:9163

CloudPrintInviteLinks.title: Mobility Print off-network links
CloudPrintInviteLinks.description: An array of off-network links of  Mobility Print server in your organisation. For example http://publicip:9163/serverid/token

PrintDeployServerHosts.title: Print Deploy server hosts
PrintDeployServerHosts.description: An array of hostname(s) or IP address(es) of the Print Deploy server(s) in your organisation, e.g., '192.168.1.2', 'mysite.com'. Do not include scheme and port number.

AccessiblePrintDeployTLSPort.title: Print Deploy server TLS port
AccessiblePrintDeployTLSPort.description: The port number of Print Deploy server to connect to when using HTTPS

StrictSSLCheckingEnabled.description: If set to true, all communications performed by Print Deploy will be enforced to use HTTPS.
